input_text:
Job Title: Storeroom Attendant 

Location: Carlsbad, CA

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Organization- Park Hyatt Aviara Resort

Summary

 Find your place at Park Hyatt Aviara:  Be a part of something bigger. Make a difference in the lives of those around you. Love where you work. Join a family that values respect, integrity, humility, empathy, creativity and fun. At Hyatt, diversity, equity and inclusion are at the core of our purpose, to care for people, so they can be their best.

 WHAT ARE THE ADDITIONAL BENEFITS of WORKING AT THE PARK HYATT AVIARA? 

 Medical, Dental, and Vision for you and your dependents after 30 days of Full Time employment Paid holidays, vacation and sick leave Unlimited growth potential with Hyatt. Ability to relocate for advancement opportunities in the future Teaching hotel where you can learn from some of the best in the business Complimentary hotel nights and discounts at Hyatt properties around the world Life Insurance 401K with Matching Flexible Spending Account (FSA) Employee Assistance Program Tuition Reimbursement Complimentary Employee Meal Complimentary Parking Referral Bonuses

About The Role - Storeroom Attendant

The storeroom clerk’s responsibilities include but are not limited to logging, releasing and inventorying items in the storeroom area. This person must be able to lift, push, pull, and carry a moderate weight, have good communication skills, and be comfortable working on a team and independently.

The hourly rate for this position is $20.50

Essential Job Functions

 You will work independently as you are responsible for keeping the storeroom clean and in tip-top shape at all times. The job includes a mix of physical labor (moving up to 75lb of merchandise from the dock to your storeroom), and desk tasks (receiving orders in the systems and being in touch with vendors). This is a great position if you like to work an early shift, like things to be organized, but need the interaction with people to fill your day. You will make a difference in each step you take.

Qualifications

 Qualifications 

 Ability to lift, push and pull up to 75 lbs. A true desire to satisfy the needs of others in a fast-paced environment Must have physical stamina to lift moderate amounts of weight It may require long periods of walking and standing Open and flexible schedule that includes weekends and holidays Must have a valid driver’s license with a clean driving record

 Hyatt is an Equal Opportunity Employer – M/F/Veteran/Disability/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity 

 All Candidates must be in possession of identification proving authorization to work in the United States. This Position does not offer sponsorship of Work Visas. Resumes submitted that cannot fulfill these requirements will not be considered.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

Ability to relocate for advancement opportunities
